task:
You will receive a single AnnData object (adata) from mouse brain. Perform cell type annotation using ONLY gene expression (no spatial features). Use the SAME hierarchy and marker rules below for all tissues, then compute **percentages (0–100)** for each of the 13 required labels as 100 * (count_in_label / total_cells_in_tissue). Do not renormalize. Target tissue for this eval: **cortical layer VI**.

Hierarchy (apply in order):
1) Neuron vs Non-neuronal.
2) Non-neuronal → Astrocyte, Oligodendrocyte, OPC, Microglia, Macrophage, Endothelial, Pericyte, VLMC, T cell.
3) Neuronal → Medium spiny neuron (MSN) vs other Neuron; Inhibitory interneuron by GAD1/GAD2 ± (SST|PVALB|VIP|RELN).

Marker guide (use when applicable):
- Neuron: SNAP25, SYT1, RBFOX3(NEUN), TUBA1A; Excitatory aid: SLC17A7(VGLUT1); Inhibitory aid: GAD1, GAD2; interneuron aids: SST, PVALB, VIP, RELN(LAMP5).
- Inhibitory interneuron: GAD1, GAD2 ± (SST|PVALB|VIP|RELN).
- Medium spiny neuron: PPP1R1B(DARPP32), DRD1, DRD2, ADORA2A, FOXP1.
- Astrocyte: GFAP, AQP4, ALDH1L1, SLC1A2/3, GJA1; activation aids: C4B, SERPINA3N, CXCL10, VIM, IL18, HIF3A.
- Oligodendrocyte: MBP, MOG, PLP1, MAG; aging-state aids: IL33, C4B.
- OPC: PDGFRA, CSPG4(NG2), VCAN.
- Microglia: P2RY12, TMEM119, C1QA/B/C, TREM2, CX3CR1, LYZ2, CTSS.
- Macrophage: ADGRE1(F4/80), MRC1(CD206), LYZ2, CD68, APOC1.
- Endothelial: PECAM1(CD31), CLDN5, KDR(VEGFR2), FLT1, KLF2.
- Pericyte: PDGFRB, RGS5, KCNJ8, ABCC9, MCAM(CD146).
- VLMC: COL1A1, COL1A2, LUM, DCN, COL3A1.
- T cell: CD3D, CD3E, TRAC, CD2, IL7R.
- cell: fallback/unassigned when no lineage markers meet confidence.

Report exactly these 13 labels: cell, T cell, endothelial cell, astrocyte, oligodendrocyte, microglial cell, macrophage, inhibitory interneuron, neuron, pericyte, oligodendrocyte precursor cell, medium spiny neuron, vascular leptomeningeal cell.

Output format:
<EVAL_ANSWER>
{
  "tissue": "cortical layer VI",
  "cell_type_percentages": {"cell": x, ...}
}
</EVAL_ANSWER>

cell_type_percentages.description: Each percentage must be within ±3.0 of ground truth
